description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Krisotron is an action packed shoot-em-up game. You play as Krisotron attempting to rescue Princess Noida from the evil Dr. Gacy. Make your way through 4 chapters (20 levels) of non stop action. Increase your abilities along the way by finding action point power ups.   Watch the video here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IbQoStBt70c
description.short: Krisotron is an action packed shoot-em-up game. You play as Krisotron attempting to rescue Princess Noida from the evil Dr. Gacy. Make your way through 4 chapters (20 levels) of non stop action. Increase your abilities along the way by finding action point power ups.   Watch the video here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IbQoStBt70c
